topic.title: Womens Health Case Summary - conformance rules

section.p: This class captures pertinent information of women's health case summarization of a patient for an assigned caseManager.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] breastCancerFamilyHistory with data type Code
Indicates whether the patient or the one of the patient's relatives have had breast cancer. Possible values include: No family history, 2nd degree relative, 1st degree relative, 3: More than one 1st degree relatives, Personal history, or Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] breastTreatment with data type Code
Identifies the current or next breast procedure or treatment recommended for this patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] breastTreatmentDate with data type Point In Time
The date when the current or next breast procedure or treatment should be completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] cervicalTreatment with data type Code
Identifies the current or next cervical procedure or treatment recommended for this patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] cervicalTreatmentDate with data type Point In Time
The date when the current or next cervical procedure or treatment should be completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] estimatedDateOfConfinement with data type Point In Time
An archaic term for the estimated date a baby might be born. It is determined based on the first day of a woman's last menstruation. See Naegele's rule.

Contains exactly one [1..1] desDaughter with data type Code
An indication of whether the patient was exposed to diethylstilbestrol (DES) in utero. Possible values include: Yes, No, or Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] historyOfSexualTrauma with data type Code
Indicates whether the patient has experienced any sexual trauma (rape, sexual assault, etc.) as a civilian. Possible values include: Yes, No, Declined to answer, Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the summary of the patient's Women's Health record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isPregnant with data type Boolean
Indicates whether the patient is currently pregnant.

Contains exactly one [1..1] papRegimen with data type Code
Identifies the current Pap regimen for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] papRegimenStartDate with data type Point In Time
The date on which the patient began or will begin her current PAP regimen.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] caseManager, where its type is Responsible Party

Contains at least one [1..*] women'sHealthNotification, where its type is Womens Health Patient Notification
Indicates the notification to the patient from the case manager.

Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
Identifies the patient associated with the procedure, notification and/or refusal.
Contains zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer

Contains zero or one [0..1] refusal, where its type is Womens Health Patient Refusal
Indicates the procedure refused by the patient.
Contains zero or more [0..*] womensHealthProcedure, where its type is Womens Health Procedure

Contains exactly one [1..1] breastCancerFamilyHistory with data type Code
Indicates whether the patient or the one of the patient's relatives have had breast cancer. Possible values include: No family history, 2nd degree relative, 1st degree relative, 3: More than one 1st degree relatives, Personal history, or Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] breastTreatment with data type Code
Identifies the current or next breast procedure or treatment recommended for this patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] breastTreatmentDate with data type Point In Time
The date when the current or next breast procedure or treatment should be completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] cervicalTreatment with data type Code
Identifies the current or next cervical procedure or treatment recommended for this patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] cervicalTreatmentDate with data type Point In Time
The date when the current or next cervical procedure or treatment should be completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] estimatedDateOfConfinement with data type Point In Time
An archaic term for the estimated date a baby might be born. It is determined based on the first day of a woman's last menstruation. See Naegele's rule.

Contains exactly one [1..1] desDaughter with data type Code
An indication of whether the patient was exposed to diethylstilbestrol (DES) in utero. Possible values include: Yes, No, or Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] historyOfSexualTrauma with data type Code
Indicates whether the patient has experienced any sexual trauma (rape, sexual assault, etc.) as a civilian. Possible values include: Yes, No, Declined to answer, Unknown.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the summary of the patient's Women's Health record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isPregnant with data type Boolean
Indicates whether the patient is currently pregnant.

Contains exactly one [1..1] papRegimen with data type Code
Identifies the current Pap regimen for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] papRegimenStartDate with data type Point In Time
The date on which the patient began or will begin her current PAP regimen.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] caseManager, where its type is Responsible Party

Contains at least one [1..*] women'sHealthNotification, where its type is Womens Health Patient Notification
Indicates the notification to the patient from the case manager.

Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
Identifies the patient associated with the procedure, notification and/or refusal.
Contains zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer

Contains zero or one [0..1] refusal, where its type is Womens Health Patient Refusal
Indicates the procedure refused by the patient.
Contains zero or more [0..*] womensHealthProcedure, where its type is Womens Health Procedure
